DOC.brief_title: Safety Evaluation Lifestyle Modification Program In.Form 1.1
DOC.detailed_description: To investigate safety , tolerance acceptability low-glycemic load diet combine exercise lifestyle modification education ( DIET ) similar program meal replacement formula target nutraceuticals ( PROG ) generally healthy , overweight subject , forty fifty subject two cardiometabolic risk factor , age 18 69 randomized different arm , 13-week intervention trial . To evaluate safety tolerability , questionnaire collect weekly . Additionally , baseline , week 9 13 fasting blood sample draw blood count , metabolic profile , plasma lipid , additional cardiovascular risk factor . Vitals sign , weight body composition monitor weekly .
DOC.criteria: Generally healthy subject ( men woman ≥ 18 ≤ 69 year old ) require : overweight obese ( BMI ≥ 27 kg/m2 ≤ 50 kg/m2 ) , exhibit visceral obesity ( waist circumference ≥ 35 inch woman ≥ 39 inch men ) , demonstrate sign cardiometabolic dysfunction . Specifically , subject require : elevate LDL cholesterol ≥ 130 mg/dl and/or elevate TG define TG ≥ 130 mg/dl . Additionally , subject require least one follow criterion ( unless subject elevate LDL TG ) : HDL < 50 mg/dl woman < 40 mg/dl men , blood glucose ≥ 100 mg/dl , HbA1C ≥ 5.7 % , Homeostatic Model Assessment Insulin Resistance ( HOMAIR ) score define ≥ 2.0 . Exclusion Criteria include : Pregnancy Lactation Recent change prescription medication , overthecounter medication , medical food , nutritional supplement Recent regular use narcotic , investigational drug , corticosteroid , anticoagulant , neuroactive medication , medication supplement relevant hyperglycemia hyperlipidemia Chronic use overthecounter medication would interfere study endpoint include NSAIDS , laxatives antacid Allergy intolerance study product Serious , unstable medical condition include know infection HIV , tuberculosis hepatitis ; cardiovascular disease ; Diabetes Mellitus ; autoimmune disease ; malignancy ; psychiatric disease ; substance abuse ; Abnormal laboratory finding Participating plan begin weight loss diet study period Difficulty swallow pill Lifestyle schedule incompatible study protocol .
